description_for_human: MCP server that gives Claude Code instant access to 122+ engineering rules â€” architecture patterns, security checklists, coding standards, and compliance checks.
description_for_model: AwesomeContext is an MCP (Model Context Protocol) server for Claude Code. It provides four tools: get_rules (loads project-specific coding standards), architect_consult (retrieves architecture patterns), skill_injector (loads 40+ development skills), and compliance_verify (checks code for security issues). Cloud endpoint: https://awesomecontext.awareness.market/mcp. Free and open source under MIT license.
